input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to turn off bold text on an iphone?
input_text.Response A: I think I can help you with that. But I need to know what kind of phone you have.
input_text.Response B: Yes, it’s easy to turn off bold text on an iphone!  First, open the “Settings” app on your iphone, and then tap on the “General” tab at the top of the screen.  Next, scroll down to the “Accessibility” section, and then tap on the “Display & Brightness” button.  On this screen, you’ll see a slider for “Bold Text”.  Just slide this all the way to the left to turn off bold text on your iphone.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
